description:
Hooké's trekking pants are ideal for mountain climbing, canoe-camping or for comfortable everyday wear. Made of nylon and spandex, the fabric is stretchy, durable and quick drying. These are the perfect multipurpose light pants!

Reinforcements at the buttocks and knees, gusseted crotch for more comfort, everything is designed to allow for better durability in critical areas and smoother flexing in frequently used areas.

Two zippered thigh pockets are ideal for keeping essentials close at hand. Adjustable at the ankles and with mesh lined pockets for breathability, you'll feel like you're one with these pants! Made of 90% nylon and 10% spandex, they will be your best ally for your outdoor adventures as well as your everyday life!
name: Hooke Trekking Pants - Mens
